eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
    \left[J^3_n, J^3_m\right] & = & -\frac{k}{2}n\delta_{n, -m} \nonumber \\*
    \left[J^3_n, J^{\pm}_m\right] & = & \pm J^{\pm}_{n+m} \nonumber\\*
    \left[J^+_n, J^-_m\right] & = & -2J^3_{n+m} + k n \delta_{n, -m}.
\

\begin{eqnarray}
    h_{J p n } & = & -\frac{J(J-1)}{k-2} + \frac{(p + nk)^2}{4k},
    \nonumber\\ \bar h_{J p n } & = & -\frac{J(J-1)}{k-2} + \frac{(p -
    n k)^2}{4k},
\
